item.description:
\


Our featured speaker at the June 8 meeting will be Don Kelly, a widely recognized inventors’ champion, former USPTO Chief of Staff and co-founder of the United Inventors Association. He is credited with establishing the USPTO’s inventor support programs. As a registered Patent Agent and Certified Licensing Professional, Don’s passionate pursuit is Adding Wings to Great Ideas™. Drawn by Don Kelly’s close relationship with America’s inventor community the Obama Transition Team sought his advice when assessing USPTO challenges and other issues confronting inventors - - an interesting exchange he’ll share with IANE as he offers sage suggestions on how we can add wings to our own great ideas. Learn more at
www.PatentAgentPlus.com
item.name: Inventors Association of New England June Meetup
